## Professional Summary
<hr>
Results-driven analytics engineer with over a decade of experience transforming complex business challenges into scalable, reliable, high-impact data solutions.

Proven track record of building robust data pipelines, modernizing analytics ecosystems, and delivering actionable insights that influence strategic decision-making across operations, portfolio management, risk management, sales, marketing, finance, and product teams. 

Lead process engineering initatives to transform high-volume manual workflows into automated, scalable systems that enhance operational efficiency, reduce operational risk, and strengthen controls.

Experienced in partnering with technical and non-technical stakeholders, leading enterprise-wide reporting initiatives, and elevating data quality and reliability through strong engineering practices.
